DOC.brief_summary: To examine the effect of Point-of-Care Ultrasound (POCUS) management guidance on pediatric skin and soft tissue infections treatment failure rate, as well as emergency department process outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness of Emergency Ultrasound Guided Management of Pediatric Soft Tissue Infections
DOC.criteria: history and examination findings consistent with possible abscess or cellulitis per the treating clinician. minimal lesion diameter for inclusion is 1cm. suspected soft tissue infections involving or near mucosal membranes (e.g. perirectal, peritonsillar, vulvovaginal areas) facial lesions paronychia or felon parent or patient refusal of consent unsuitable subjects deemed by treating clinicians.
